column4: I know this is ubuntu, but there is no-one in Knoppix. If someone has a moment that can help:...

Hello. I was wondering if someone would help. I'm currently using the knoppix 5.1.1 live DVD. I currently have Fedora Core 6 installed on my hdd. I would like to install Knoppix on my hdd over fc6. I'm not quite sure how to do this with the installer. I think I need to partition the hdd, but I'm not quite sure how to do this. The installer lets you manual partition as an option, but I've never done it before. Can someone help?
prolly #knoppix would be the right place to ask
if you want to use gparte use another repo than the ubuntu repo. ununtus gparte version is badly outdated and has seirous bugs (=read: it can destroy all your data)
